column1: {% for event in events %}"{{ event.title | xml_escape | csv_escape | csv_escape_2 }}"
column8: {{ event.description | markdownify | xml_escape | csv_escape | csv_escape_2 | strip_html }}
column11: {% if event.social_card_image.url %}{{ event.social_card_image.url | strip | prepend: "https:" }}{% endif %}
column12: {% if event.images %}{% for i in event.images %}{{ i.url | append: ";" | prepend: "https:" }}{% endfor %}{% endif %}
